user.description: When specifying the origin and destination, you can supply the location in the form of an address, latitude/longitude coordinates, or an entity id.

data.destination: Destination as GPS coordinates or an entity id
data.origin: Origin as GPS coordinates or an entity id
data.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::name%]

init.description: You can optionally specify either a Departure Time or Arrival Time. You can enter a 24 hour time string like `08:00:00`.
